title: Mistaken
description: Enemies by circumstance of Creation Sworn to their purpose, the Vampire and the Witchwere created to battle over the fate of mankind. He was the FirstUntil one Vampire sought a Higher Purpose.She was the BeginningAnd one Witch’s faith brought Darkness into the Light.Their love would turn the course of the Ancient War…Before the Prophecy, an Ancient Queen and the Vampire she loved would forge the path for those that would follow.
author: Heather Fleener
